FuncDef:
The tariff-level command configures a tariff level for DAA accounting.
The undo tariff-level command restores the default configuration.
By default, no tariff level is configured for DAA accounting.

ParaDef.Info:
Configures a tariff level for DAA accounting.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 8.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To distinguish DAA services, run the tariff-level command in the traffic behavior view to match the DAA service of the tariff level configured using the tariff-level qos-profile command in the DAA service policy view.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
The tariff-level command is mutually exclusive with the traffic-policy outbound vxlan-mode command in the bridge domain view .
